page.title: 09THE VIEW FROM MY WINDOW
page.content:
When I wake up in the morning I look out at the beautiful view of trees,one house,sheep,walks and part of a farm. The types of trees that I can see are pines,douglas firs and some oak.I think that the trees in the Autunm look better than any other season. It is lovely to see the leaves changing from green to yellow,red,orange and gold.
I can see a croft which belongs to Mr and Mrs Bergant.They have a few sheep on the land.The sheep do not stay the same all the year round.They change from white to a light brown in the winter. If I look from the edge of my window I can see the farm house up the road. It has rough cast on the outside then there is brick.There are ponies,ducks, hens and one cow used for milk.
